name: grafana-connector
description: Example Grafana Simple JSON connector for ArangoDB.
author: ArangoDB GmbH

collections.description: Names of collections that will be exposed as targets, comma-separated.

aggregation.description: Aggregation function. Should be one of SUM, AVG, MIN, MAX.

filterExpression.description: An AQL expression used to filter data. The current document is called 'doc'.

dateField.description: Name of the field containing the date time for each data point. Either set 'dateField' or 'dateExpression'.

dateExpression.description: An AQL expression for the data field. The current document is called 'doc'. Either set 'dateField' or 'dateExpression'.

valueField.description: Name of the field containing the numerical value for each data point. Either set 'valueField' or 'valueExpression'.

valueExpression.description: An AQL expression for a numerical value for each data point. The current document is called 'doc'. Either set 'valueField' or 'valueExpression'.

username.description: Username incoming requests should use to authenticate.

password.description: Password incoming requests should use to authenticate.
